title: #CES2020 Preview and Xiaomi’s insecurity
description: C. Scott Brown joins Joe and Adam to talk about what he’s excited about for CES next week. Looking back on a decade of Android we revisit some of the most iconic Android phones from the 2010s. Plus we look ahead to some things we’d like to see out of phone makers in 2020.  Finally, another Wi-Fi camera security concern, this time coming from Xiaomi. All this and some more surprises along the way. Recorded January 3, 2020 Topics Report: 12 million Huawei Mate 30 phones shipped, but where? LG in 2020: Time for a turnaround Leaked LG G9 ThinQ renders reveal handset design CES 2020: What to expect from the Las Vegas trade show 20 things we want from phones in 2020: Raising the bar The best Android phones of the decade: 2010-2019 From OnePlus 6T to OnePlus One: A week with a 5-year-old phone Google Nest Hub shows Xiaomi security cam footage from other homes The Android Authority podcast is: Adam Doud - @DeadTechnology Jonathan Feist - @JFeist1 / @DroneRushcom Joe Hindy - @ThatJoeHindy Special Guest appearance by: C. Scott Brown - @C_scottbrown Produced by Adam Doud Check out the other podcasts in our network! The DGiT Daily podcast The SoundGuys Podcast
